recipe_name: Sweetcorn pancakes with spiced yoghurt dip
author: James Tanner
method: Whisk together the flours, egg and milk to make a smooth batter. Stir in the sweetcorn and chives. Heat two teaspoons of vegetable oil in a frying pan and add a spoonful of batter. Fry until the base is golden, then turn over. Drain on kitchen paper. Repeat with the remaining batter. Mix the dip ingredients together in a small bowl and season. To serve, stack the pancakes on a plate and serve with a dollop of the yoghurt dip.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz self-raising flour,  1 tbsp cornflour,  1 free-range egg,  6-7 tbsp milk,  85g/3oz canned sweetcorn, drained,  small bunch chives, finely chopped,  vegetable oil, for frying,  150ml/5fl oz Greek-style yoghurt,  ½ tsp harissa,  squeeze lemon juice
